item.title: Christina add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Christina add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Christina add a quote by bell hooks
item.description: "When we drop fear, we can draw nearer to people, we can draw nearer to the earth, we can draw nearer to all the heavenly creatures that surround us." -- bell hooks

item.title: Christina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Christina add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Christina add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Christina add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Don't give in to your fears. If you do, you won't be able to talk to your heart." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Christina add a quote by Sojourner Truth
item.description: "If women want rights more than they got, why don't they just take them, and not be talking about it." -- Sojourner Truth

item.title: Christina add a quote by Gloria Anzaldua
item.description: "The struggle is inner: Chicano, indio, American Indian, mojado, mexicano, immigrant Latino, Anglo in power, working class Anglo, Black, Asian--our psyches resemble the bordertowns and are populated by the same people. The struggle has always been inner, and is played out in outer terrains. Awareness of our situation must come before inner changes, which in turn come before changes in society. Nothing happens in the "real" world unless it first happens in the images in our heads." -- Gloria Anzaldua

item.title: Christina add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "None but ourselves can free our minds." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Christina add a quote by Haile Selassie I
item.description: "Until the philosophy which holds one race superior and another inferior is finally and permanently discredited and abandoned, everywhere is war and until there are no longer first-class and second-class citizens of any nation, until the color of a man's skin is of no more significance than the color of his eyes. And until the basic human rights are equally guaranteed to all without regard to race, there is war. And until that day, the dream of lasting peace, world citizenship, rule of international morality, will remain but a fleeting illusion to be pursued, but never attained... now everywhere is war.” Popularized by Bob Marley in the song War" -- Haile Selassie I

item.title: Christina add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Don't Gain The World & Lose Your Soul, Wisdom Is Better Than Silver Or Gold." -- Bob Marley
